metadata.title: Read and Write to External I2C EEPROM with FSP 3.5.0 and EK-RA6M3 Kit

sections.content: The below attached project for FSP 3.5.0 and the EK-RA6M3 kit demonstrates the use of FSP APIs to access an external 24L128 (128 kbit) I2C EEPROM.
Here are some details from the hal_entry.c file:

/*
 * IIC Channel 2
 * SDA - P511
 * SCL - P512
 * Above pins are on the EK-RA6M3 Arduino header J14
 *
 * Tested with 24LC128 EEPROM (128 kbit / 16kB)
 *
 *  */
The project demonstrates EEPROM reads and writes using a wait for a callback event to indicate the action is complete.

Suitable Products
RA and FSP
